Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI helped me consider angles I hadn't and gave me a rough idea of feedback, but teacher feedback was hugely more beneficial and I knew the feedback would assist in reaching the assessment goal as they were the ones to write/mark the assessment.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI sometimes didn't understand the goals of the assessment as well as staff
